Name: bleaching and dyeing, yarn | bleaching and dyeing, yarn | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1313:Finishing of textiles
Description: Package dyeing technology is used. The following processes are used to dye cotton yarn: Pre treatment of yarn (Ready for Dyeing), Dyeing, hydro extraction, drying conditionng, and utilities. The process involves immersing yarn in dyebath and the bath circulates around the yarn. Bath is heated by electricity generated  steam. This is followed by water extraction, drying and conditioning.
